review: Recently I did my Dental filling treatment from Dr. Pooja. She is very energetic, knowledgeable and professional. She is very good at her job. Whole treatment process was very smooth and comfortable. You can trust her to help any teeth related issue. Thanks a lot for your wonderful service. Highly recommend.
I recently visited the clinic. I am very satisfied with the service. Doctor is very supportive and helpful.

I had visited 32by7 dental clinic for cleaning & polishing. Dr. Pooja performed scaling on my teeth with precision and care. Her gentle approach made the procedure comfortable, and she took the time to explain each step. I left feeling refreshed and confident in my improved oral health. Highly recommended for anyone seeking expert scaling treatment.

Dr. Pooja is very much good doctor . She is very humble and professional. She give good  advice with her friendly nature . I recommend to my family and friends to visit her 32by7clinic which is located at loudon street in Park Street area , Kolkata .
Service is very good, and very professional approach overall. I was visiting 1 St time but the way the clinic received me was a really feeling special
I recommend Dr. Poojas name to my friends and family members.  Her expert and friendly advice helped me most. I give her 10 out 10 .. I am very much satisfied about the service. Thank you so much.
I have underwent restoration treatment, she was very helpful and explained the procedures, and I was very happy with the results... very well behaved and professional!
